resources.title: Australian Injectable Drugs Handbook
resources.organization: Society of Hospital Pharmacists of Australia
resources.description: Comprehensive reference guide for injectable drugs used in Australian healthcare settings, providing essential information on drug compatibility, administration, and stability.

resources.title: Australian Bureau of Statistics
resources.description: National statistical agency providing comprehensive data and analysis on Australia's economy, population, environment, and social conditions. Primary source for official Australian statistics.

resources.title: Australian Bureau of Agricultural and Resource Economics and Sciences
resources.organization: Australian Government Department of Agriculture, Fisheries and Forestry
resources.description: Provides research, analysis, and data on agriculture, fisheries, forestry, and resource economics. Essential resource for understanding Australian primary industries and rural economy.

resources.title: Australia & New Zealand Newsstream
resources.description: Full-text database providing access to current and historical news content from major Australian and New Zealand newspapers, including The Australian, The Sydney Morning Herald, and The Age.

resources.title: Australasian Legal Information Institute
resources.organization: University of Technology Sydney and University of New South Wales
resources.description: Free access to Australian legal materials including legislation, case law, treaties, and law reform reports. Premier source for Australian legal research and information.

resources.title: ARDC Research Data Australia
resources.description: National discovery service for Australian research data, collections, projects, and researchers. Facilitates data sharing and collaboration across research institutions.

resources.title: Analysis & Policy Observatory
resources.organization: Swinburne University of Technology and University of Melbourne
resources.description: Comprehensive repository of Australian public policy resources including research papers, reports, and analysis. Connects researchers, policy makers, and practitioners.

resources.title: ADA Dataverse - Australian Data Archive
resources.description: National service for collection, preservation, and sharing of social science research data. Provides long-term access to Australian social, political, and economic data.

metadata.description: Collection of Australian academic and research resources
